results.description: Brighton & Hove Albion Women sign France midfielder Lea Le Garrec from French club Guingamp for an undisclosed fee.
results.shortTitle: Brighton Women sign France midfielder Le Garrec
results.title: Lea Le Garrec: Brighton Women sign France midfielder

results.description: Former Sunderland defender Papy Djilobodji is handed a six-match ban after breaking an opponent's nose by kicking him in the face.
results.title: Papy Djilobodji: Six-match ban for ex-Sunderland defender after breaking opponent's nose

results.description: Kylian Mbappe and Edinson Cavani score hat-tricks as Paris St-Germain put nine goals past Guingamp to earn a record-breaking victory.
results.shortTitle: PSG put nine past Guingamp in record win
results.title: Paris St-Germain 9-0 Guingamp: Kylian Mbappe & Edinson Cavani score hat-tricks

results.description: Unbeaten Ligue 1 leaders and holders Paris St-Germain suffer a shock French League Cup exit against the top-flight's bottom side Guingamp.
results.shortTitle: Holders PSG suffer shock League Cup exit
results.title: PSG out of French League Cup, Thierry Henry's Monaco progress

results.description: Ex-Sunderland midfielder Didier Ndong agrees to join French club Guingamp after his Black Cats contract was terminated.
results.shortTitle: Ex-Sunderland man Ndong to join Guingamp
results.title: Didier Ndong: Former Sunderland midfielder to join Guingamp after contract terminated

results.description: Former Chelsea striker Didier Drogba's 17-year-old son Isaac joins French Ligue 1 club Guingamp.
results.shortTitle: Didier Drogba's son signs for Guingamp
results.title: Didier Drogba's 17-year-old son Isaac joins French Ligue 1 side Guingamp

results.description: Holders Paris St-Germain overcome the absence of injured Neymar to reach the last 16 of the French Cup with victory over Guingamp.
results.title: Paris Saint Germain 4-2 Guingamp

thumbnail.altText: Paris St-Germain players celebrate scoring against Guingamp in the French Cup

results.description: Winger Yeni Ngbakoto leaves QPR to join French Ligue 1 club Guingamp for an undisclosed fee.
results.shortTitle: Winger Ngbakoto leaves QPR for Guingamp
results.title: Yeni Ngbakoto: QPR winger joins Guingamp for undisclosed fee

results.description: Dis na selection of the best photos from across Africa and of Africans for this week.
results.title: Africa's week in pictures: 8 - 14 September 2017

thumbnail.altText: A man sells socks along a street in Lekki, Lagos, Nigeria September 12, 2017

results.description: Follow live text coverage of El Clasico in the Spanish Super Cup first leg, after Neymar scored on his PSG debut in a win at Guingamp.
results.shortTitle: Barcelona 1-3 Real Madrid - Ronaldo scores then sent off
results.title: Sunday's European football: Barcelona v Real Madrid

results.description: Edinson Cavani scores twice as Paris St-Germain beat Guingamp to go within three points of Ligue 1 leaders Monaco.
results.title: Paris St-Germain 4-0 Guingamp

results.description: Nice striker Mickael le Bihan scores twice on his return after 17 months out with a broken leg as they beat Montpellier.
results.title: Nice 2-1 Montpellier

results.description: French champions Paris St-Germain lose at Guingamp, increasing the scrutiny on manager Unai Emery.
results.title: Guingamp 2-1 Paris St-Germain
